title: I deleted my league.client.exe
body: I deleted my league.client.exe in an effort to fix a glitch. I have the glitch fixed now, but now I can't open the game because I deleted  the client. I know I can probably just reinstall LoL, but can I do anything else? Please help!

replies.body: Also, now that the problem is fixed I have another. When I try to open the shortcut, it says "The file or  directory is corrupted and unreadable." Now what?

> [{quoted}](name=SherbertSheep621,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=79YNHf4q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-05T14:19:54.113+0000)
>
> Also, now that the problem is fixed I have another. When I try to open the shortcut, it says "The file or  directory is corrupted and unreadable." Now what?

Open it directly.. or create a new shortcut.

If the client file is still in your recycle bin, you should be able to just right click on it and click restore to send it back where it should be. If that doesn't work, you may need to grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a reinstall with it.

Glad to hear you were able to fix that glitch!!!
Oh, ok thx. I tried that but it didn't appear in the bin. Now its back in! IDK why it wasn't showing up last night, but thanks anyways.
